thread.title: Spotlight on St. Augustine's Jim Brady
thread.title_full: Spotlight on St. Augustine's Jim Brady

title: Spotlight on St. Augustine's Jim Brady
text:
Phil Anastasia, Inquirer Staff Writer Posted: Friday, October 16, 2015, 3:01 AM 
Jim Brady has been the heartbeat of the St. Augustine Prep defense. 
The 6-foot-0, 210-pound linebacker was named MaxPreps' regional Player of the Week for his work in the Hermits' 27-3 victory over Mainland last Friday. 
"He is a relentless player who at times has taken over games from a defensive perspective," St. Augustine coach Mark Reardon said. 
Brady has led a St. Augustine defense that has allowed just 41 points as the Hermits have fashioned a 5-0 record, seized first place in the CAL American Division and risen to the No. 2 spot in The Inquirer Top 25. More coverage
